channel.title: Link Layer Discovery Protocol on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Link Layer Discovery Protocol on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: Voice VLAN
item.description: In Cumulus Linux, a voice VLAN is a VLAN dedicated to voice traffic on a switch port. However, the term can mean different things to different vendors. Voice VLAN is part of a trunk port with 2 VLANs that comprises either: Native VLAN, which carries both data and voice traffic, or Voice VLAN, which carries the voice traffic, and a data or native VLAN, which carries the data traffic in a trunk port.
